channel.title: Blog on granthutchison
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on granthutchison

item.title: Addings Ads
item.description: Adding Ads… and stuff… # Yep, I’ve done it…sorry. I’ve gone ahead and added some hideous advertising all across the site…but why? Good question, and I’m not sure I have a good answer… It’s not really to make money, as the volume of readers of this site are tiny. It’s a site I’ve built far more for myself than for anyone else, but hey, if you’ve found you’re way here thanks for visiting (and if you’ve enjoyed your time here, even better!
